channel.title: MCMC on Oren's ML Lounge
channel.description: Recent content in MCMC on Oren's ML Lounge

item.title: Understanding The MCMC Algorithm - Part 1
item.description: In this next series of posts I will try to explain the ideas behind the Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) algorithms used in computer softwares and packages in order to compute the posterior distribution when using bayesian methods.
